name: exchangeP
overview:
exchangeP is a fantasy stock market for betting on the future success (or failure) of private companies. Registration is free and monthly cash prizes are awarded to the top traders.

exchangeP uses the wisdom of crowds to provide real-time consensus valuations of the hottest, most debated, private companies. How much is that company really worth? Let the market decide.
